doc:
Thomas A. Curran https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_A._Curran 0 Thomas A. Curran (May 29, 1879 – January 24, 1941), was an Australian-born American actor on the stage and in motion pictures. Between 1915 and 1941 he appeared in 60 films, the last of which was Citizen Kane, in which he played the uncredited role of Theodore Roosevelt in the "News on the March" newsreel sequence. Thomas_A._Curran ( May_29 , 1879 – January_24 , 1941 ) , was an_Australian-born_American_actor on the_stage and in motion_pictures .
